feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 22, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates

Sep 22, 07:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 8, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 20, 15:34 UTC

Sep 14, 19:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 27/09/2022 10:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

Sep 20, 22:18 UTC

entry.title: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Rack 45B27
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 2, 22:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 04:00 UTC

Sep 20, 16:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/10/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 04/10/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the operation.
Related Incident : [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B27
Service improvement : We are moving over the servers from rack 45B27. This resolved the issue with the remote reboot device being unavailable.

We stay vigilant about the evolution of this situation.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated Servers] - G267A05
entry.content:
Sep 24, 20:21 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/09/2022 17:45 UTC
End Time : 24/09/2022 21:15 UTC
Service status :All the servers are operational again. The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Sep 24, 19:51 UTC
Update - Update: 96% of the impacted servers are operational, our teams are working on a fix for the remaing ones.

Sep 24, 18:32 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/09/2022 17:45 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently unreachable.
Root cause : An electrical issue was at the origin of this incident.
Ongoing actions : A correction on the remaining servers is in progress by our teams.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated Servers] - G263B04
entry.content:
Sep 24, 14:25 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/09/2022 13:17 UTC
End Time : 24/09/2022 14:13 UTC
Root cause : Our technical teams resolved the issue.
All servers in the impacted rack are baack to operational.

Sep 24, 14:00 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/09/2022 13:17 UTC
Service impact : Almost all servers are operational, our teams are working on the remaining servers.
Root cause : An electrical issue was at the origin of this incident.
Ongoing actions : A correction on the remaining servers is in progress by our teams.

Sep 24, 13:34 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/09/2022 13:17 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
